title: Monday Pt2: Bills dominate, Impressive teams, Nate Burleson, Raiders/Chiefs on MNF, and bad Brady sack?
itunes:title: Monday Pt2: Bills dominate, Impressive teams, Nate Burleson, Raiders/Chiefs on MNF, and bad Brady sack?
description:
Part Two of the Good Morning Football Podcast begins with the Bills dominant win over the Steelers. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty discuss Buffalo avoiding a trap game before their upcoming matchup with the Chiefs.  The table reveals which teams impressed them most before Nate Burleson drops by to talk Raiders-Chiefs on Monday Night Football.  Plus, could the roughing the passer penalty against the Falcons ultimately cost Atlanta a playoff berth?

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
